context: Hello, how are you? I'm great, thank you so much. I'm stuck on animated films.

I'm super excited for Super Troopers 2 (2018) Hope its as good as the first one though.
Oh yes I want to see that one so bad. I can't wait.
Same, both are my favorite genre of films.
